IS_USER_OVER_18: User must be over 18 years old.

IS_PASSWORD_SECURE.VERY_WEAK: This is a heavily used password.
IS_PASSWORD_SECURE.WEAK: Add more words that are less common.

PASSWORDS_DO_NOT_MATCH: Password and password confirmation should be equal.
CURRENT_AND_NEW_PASSWORD_DOESNT_EQUAL: Current password and new password should not be equal.
IS_IN: {FIELD_NAME} must be one of the following: {ALLOWED_VALUES}.
